title: Why do I never see law enforcement on River Road south of Independence in the morning (6:30-7:30)?  Cars often pass me at 60 miles an hour.  The road is full of curves as well as bicyclists and runners yet drivers seem confident enough to open it up each morning and exceed the speed limit by 15-20 miles per hour
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
